attributes.action: Ensure that age discrimination legislation applies to all employees of the Ministry of Defence including the Armed Forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the present moment, members of the Armed Forces are currently excluded from this legislation, just as they were with Gender Legislation which is now thankfully fully enshrined. When will the Armed Forces minister realise that he will face the same embarassing court cases as he did previously. And this from a Labour Government which prides itself on the compliance with all labour relations legislation.
